EmailTemplate.name: 16. CST Delivery NICK (RE/MP/HA/RS)
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Five Star Professional client success tracker is ready!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.Name},
We’ve created a new report that shows you the progress and results of your Five Star Professional marketing tools. You can view your tracker by clicking here: {!Contact.Client_Success_Tracker_URL__c}
The Client Success Tracker is designed to help you track your Five Star Professional marketing tools by showing you the engagement and interaction you’ve had so far.
Please take a look and don’t hesitate to reach out to us with questions regarding the tracker or your Five Star Professional marketing tools.
You can also set up an appointment to discuss and review your tools in more detail with your dedicated Client Success Representative by clicking here: {!Contact.Profile_Plus_Link__c}
Thank you,
{!User.Name} Client Success Representative Five Star Professional 888-438-5782 customerservice@fivestarprofessional.com www.fivestarprofessional.com
